mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_hero_power(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        n = len(test_case)
        caves = [cave[1:] for cave in test_case]
        min_levels = [(max((x - i + 1 for (i, x) in enumerate(cave))), len(cave)) for cave in caves]
        min_levels.sort(key=lambda x: x[0])
        sub = 1
        for (i, x) in enumerate(min_levels):
            min_levels[i] = x[0] - sub
            sub += x[1]
        results.append(max((x for x in min_levels)))
    return results

            min_levels[i] = x[0] - sub

        results.append(max((x for x in min_levels)))
    return results

mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_hero_power(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        n = len(test_case)
        caves = [cave[1:] for cave in test_case]
        min_levels = [(max((x - i + -1 for (i, x) in enumerate(cave))), len(cave)) for cave in caves]
        min_levels.sort(key=lambda x: x[0])
        sub = 0
        for (i, x) in enumerate(min_levels):
            min_levels[i] = x[0] - sub
            sub += x[1]
        results.append(max((x for x in min_levels)))
    return results
